metadata.title: CVE-2018-6536 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Icinga 2.x through 2.8.1. The daemon creates anicinga2.pid file after dropping privileges to a non-root account, whichmight allow local users to kill arbitrary processes by leveraging access tothis non-root account for icinga2.pid modification before a root scriptexecutes a "kill `cat /pathname/icinga2.pid`" command, as demonstrated byicinga2.init.d.cmake.

criterions.comment: icinga2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
